mapper.insert:
select board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into board(boardNo, title, memNo, nickname, content, visited, recommend, category, isMain, filePath) values(#{boardNo}, #{title}, #{memNo}, #{nickname}, #{content}, #{visited}, #{recommend}, #{category}, #{isMain}, #{filePath})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from board
where ${searchCondition} like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
select a.pwd from member a join board b on a.memno=b.memno where boardNo=#{boardNo}
